name: DailyWordReverse
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily reverse
des:
Hi ALL,

This Skill would help you Learn how to spell in Reverse.
Also, you can play a Fast Paced Quiz with Alexa..!!

Intent to Start the Skill- Alexa, Open Daily Reverse 
Intent to Start the Skill and Play Quiz Directly- Alexa, Open Daily Reverse and Play Quiz

Kindly spell the words with a little pause between each Alphabet for Alexa to recognize.
And Please do leave a feedback for me to improve the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
